meanings.definition: The act of placing a financial burden or responsibility on someone.
meanings.sent1: After the chargings, he had to carefully budget his money.
meanings.sent2: The chargings for the repairs were unexpectedly high.
meanings.sent3: The chargings for the party made him rethink his spending habits.
meanings.sent4: The chargings on his credit card kept piling up like a mountain.
meanings.sent5: The chargings on his account were like heavy weights dragging him down.

meanings.definition: The process of filling an object or device with electrical energy.
meanings.sent1: She completed the chargings of the battery before the trip.
meanings.sent2: The chargings of the phone were necessary for it to function.
meanings.sent3: The chargings of the electric car were quick and efficient.
meanings.sent4: The chargings of the laptop were interrupted by a power outage.
meanings.sent5: The chargings of the flashlight brought light to the dark room.

meanings.definition: The act of rushing forward with force or aggression.
meanings.sent1: The bull's chargings towards the matador were fierce.
meanings.sent2: The chargings of the protestors caught the attention of the authorities.
meanings.sent3: The chargings of the toddler towards the playground were adorable.
meanings.sent4: The chargings of the waves against the shore were relentless.
meanings.sent5: The chargings of the football team towards the goal were unstoppable.
